text: Ergersheim is a municipality in Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim, Middle Franconia. Administrative offices are in Uffenheim. ==Villages== *Ergersheim *Ermetzhofen *Kellermühle *Neuherberg *Obermühle *Seenheim ==Twin town== *Ergersheim, Bas-Rhin ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim
title: Ergersheim, Middle Franconia
